pullRequest.title: Add incremental consent
pullRequest.bodyText: Add incremental consent and add properties

commit.message: Use the user information obtained for the first time as the default user , only change Authorities

nodes.bodyText:
"defaultOidcUser" appeared more than one time. Maybe we can define:
private static final String DEFAULT_OIDC_USER = "defaultOidcUser";
And did you test it? Whether DefaultOidcUser serialize / deserialize well?
Can we update method isAuthzClient, add getOnDemand logic in method isAuthzClient?
authorizationProperties is not used in AzureClientRegistrationRepository?

commit.message: change the way to get session and optimized code

nodes.bodyText: Can we pass properties instead of properties.getAuthorization()? Maybe we need other property item in AzureClientRegistrationRepository.

Maybe we should move  && !authorizationProperties.get(id).getOnDemand() to public boolean isAuthzClient(String id).
And enrich AzureActiveDirectoryConfigurationTest.

commit.message: add test for properties of onDemand

nodes.bodyText: https://graph.microsoft.com/User.Read belong to graph client, so https://graph.microsoft.com/User.Read should not exist in DefaultScopes, is that right?
